channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feds: no evidence drones sighted in New Jersey are linked to foreign actors, no threat to safety
item.description: With Americans' fervor mounting about mysterious drone sightings over New Jersey, government officials on Saturday had few answers as to who was opera...

item.title: Trump taps Richard Grenell as presidential envoy for special missions, Edward S. Walsh as Ireland ambassador
item.description: Trump named Richard Grenell, former acting director of national intelligence, as an envoy for special missions and Edward S. Walsh as his pick to serv...

item.title: Trump announces more nominations, including Devin Nunes, Troy Edgar and Bill White
item.description: Trump nominated Truth Social CEO Devin Nunes as chairman of his Intelligence Advisory Board, Troy Edgar as deputy secretary of Homeland Security and B...

item.title: Trump could resurrect his old D.C. hotel
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is reportedly looking into a deal to bring his former District of Columbia hotel back to life.

item.title: New York State’s Coming Energy Crisis
item.description: The state only narrowly avoided a major catastrophe two winters ago. Its subpar grid makes a real one all but inevitable.

item.title: Dems Call Trump A Threat To Democracy Because He Can Turn Their Lawfare Back On Them
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is apparently a threat to democracy because he has the power to use the DOJ the way Democrats did against him.

item.title: ABC to pay Trump $15 million legal settlement in defamation suit
item.description: ABC has agreed to pay $15 million to settle a defamation lawsuit brought by President-elect Donald Trump, ending the dispute that centered on anchor G...

item.title: Corrupt Media Obsess Over Luigi Mangione After Memory Holing Trump’s Would-Be Assassins
item.description: The media builds a mystique around an alleged murderer while ignoring two gunmen who targeted a presidential candidate.

item.title: Might Baby Jesus, a Spanish Pointer, or a Pair of Ruby Slippers Land Under Your Tree?
item.description: Old Masters sales in London test Christmas wish lists.

item.title: Syria Is a Land of America’s Enemies, and We Should Stay Out
item.description: If our enemies are going to keep warring with each other, let them.

item.title: How Team Trump Turned The RNC Into A Get-Out-The-Vote Machine
item.description: The party needed significant reform after having to pick up the pieces from the dismal tenure of Ronna Romney McDaniel.

item.title: By Bowing To The Leftist Mob, Caitlin Clark Abandons Her Most Ardent Defenders
item.description: What Clark fails to realize is that the leftists she's trying to appease will never embrace her.

item.title: Luigi Mangione: Touch of Evil
item.description: The murder of CEO Brian Thompson is a test of moral clarity.

item.title: NJ lawmaker calls for limited state of emergency to combat mysterious drones
item.description: Phil Murphy is pushing for a limited state of emergency and ground all drones as a way of getting to the bottom of ongoing reports of unmanned craft s...

item.title: Identity Politics Don’t Belong in Medicine, Either
item.description: In November, Americans rejected identity politics. They should reject identity medicine, too.

item.title: Trump seizes on drone controversy to mock Chris Christie
item.description: President-elect Trump mocked his ex-ally, former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie, Saturday by seizing on the mysterious New Jersey drone controversy on...

item.title: GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin Decries Social Media For Giving Americans Insight Into Congress’s Backdoor Dealmaking
item.description: The Sooner State Republican decried how social media has hampered lawmakers' ability to negotiate on legislation behind closed doors.

item.title: Biden faces scrutiny over clemency granted to individuals convicted in major corruption cases
item.description: President Joe Biden is facing backlash over granting clemency to individuals convicted in major public corruption cases.

item.title: Appeals court judge rescinds retirement after Trump's election victory
item.description: A federal appeals court judge has rescinded his decision to retire, becoming the third judge to decide not to give President-elect Donald Trump a chan...

item.title: Nancy Pelosi announces major surgery after fall in Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Rep. Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., underwent successful hip surgery overseas after her fall in Luxembourg, her office revealed in a sta...
